snippet.title: PHP and Perl crashing the enterprise party
snippet.description: Java and .Net used to be the enterprise's primary programming languages, but Perl, Python, and other dynamic languages are hitting the enterprise mainstream.

snippet.title: Microsoft digs into PHP
snippet.description: Software giant needs to integrate with leading Web technologies like the scripting language, if it hopes to compete effectively on the Web.

snippet.title: Are you a PHP developer with mad skills? We need you!
snippet.description: We're looking for an experienced PHP developer to support our ongoing efforts to fill the Internet with amazingness. We'd love to hear from you.

snippet.title: Analyst: New developer demographics favor Linux, PHP
snippet.description: As .Net and Java programmers age and retire, the future looks bright for dynamic programming languages, Linux, and open source generally, Forrester finds.

snippet.title: That 'P' in PHP stands for 'pink': It's Nerd Barbie!
snippet.description: An online contest from Mattel unveils the latest "career" for the iconic doll: she's now a computer engineer. But do real female programmers actually wear that much pink?

snippet.title: Zend targets Java with growing PHP community
snippet.description: Company plans to undermine Java--and Sun--by building up a paying community around the scripting language.

snippet.title: Eclipse opens doors to PHP crowd
snippet.description: The Eclipse PHP Development Tools project, which invites millions of Web scripters to the integrated development environment, incites changes for Zend Technologies.

snippet.title: PHP; LogMaster; Linksys 8 port firmware; Kilometre; Jotz; more
snippet.description: PHP; LogMaster; Linksys 8 port firmware; Kilometre; Jotz; more

snippet.title: ATTO ExpressPCI; PDF Enhancer; PHP; A Better Finder Rename; more
